args:
Wu Kong learns that Mei Hou Wang was once
a good fiend, but after he was betrayed and
sealed away, he became obsessed with
revenge. Hoping to put an end to his spite,
the prince and his friends head out to face
down the enraged fiend.
Well, we kicked some butt and made our\nway to the Jin Gu Er, but I'm not really\nsure how to handle this ＂seal＂ business.

Wait. You mean you came all this way
without a method to actually complete
the most important part of your plan?
Oh, but you are a foolish old warhorse!
Yes, well, step aside. If I follow the\nsealing procedure in reverse, I should\nbe able to undo it easily enough.
At this rate, he's gonna learn enough about\nQilin relics to become a sealer himself.
Apologies for the delay. I believe I have\nlargely removed the seal. Now, let's see\nwhat happens, shall we?
Aaaand here come the fiends, as expected.\nMei Hou Wang should also awaken \nbefore long.
Right then. Let's handle the fiend situation\nbefore he does, and make sure his power\nis nice and spent.
Why does Mei Hou Wang\nhate mortals so much?
It's not just because he's a fiend, is it?\nHe made it sound like there's something\nmore to it.
...Very well. I suppose you deserve to\nknow after everything that has occurred.
Mei Hou Wang was originally a gentle\nfiend that did not attack people.
There were few among the ancient Qilin\nwho did not interact with him to at least\nsome extent.
His is an exceedingly uncommon case—\none might even call him a mutant of sorts.

Unfortunately, he had an ability to produce
fiends—whether he wanted to or not.
And slowly but surely, those fiends
began to claim lives.
Gradually, even those Qilin who he knew\ncame to shun and revile him.

Finally, faced with the choice of people
meeting their extinction or sealing away
Mei Hou Wang, there were none left
who cared enough to protect him.
He was forsaken by his companions\nand sealed alone inside the Jin Gu Er.
I KNEW I recognized him from somewhere.
When I was fooling around with the\nJin Gu Er that one time and it ended\nup taking me over, I heard his voice.
All he wanted was a chance\nto be with someone again.
Master, I want to be that person!
Absurdities piled up into the sky!\nA fiend will not coexist with a person.\nIt simply is not done.
Yeah, well, humans aren't supposed to\nbecome sealers, but you didn't let anyone\ntell you what to do when it came to me!
I became a sealer because you\nBELIEVED that I could!
And yeah, it was hard, but I stuck with it\nbecause you had faith in me.
I wanna do the same for Mei Hou Wang!
...Heh. And to think you were\na mere child so recently...
When did you grow enough to have\nthoughts so worthy of praise?
Well, if this is the path you will walk,\nthere may be ONE way to deal with\nMei Hou Wang without sealing...
However, it is terribly dangerous,\nand I cannot guarantee your safety.
I'm willing to risk it for a friend.
Well, hell. Of COURSE this wouldn't\ngo according to plan—these fiends are\nsupposed to STOP comin' at some point!
I place the blame at the feet of the fool\nwho concocted this cockamamie plot.\nWho was that again, hmmMMM?
Hey! You went along with it!
Why are there so many fiends here?!\nI thought the Jin Gu Er was sealed!
Yeaaah, sorry about that. We sorta...\npopped the seal back open.
Without consulting Xuan Zang?!\nAre you MAD?!
Weeeelll... It appears someone missed\nme more than they let on.
Oh, I didn't miss you at all, pal.\nBut I know someone who did,\nand he wants to talk.
Talk? TALK?! Oh, but you people have\nalways been so exceedingly worthless!
The Qilin of old were the same—\nalways believing we could all be\njust ever such great friends!

But when fiends ravaged their city,
their true colors were revealed.
Fear ruled the day, and they picked
me up and sealed me away.
It was then that I swore to one day give\nthem the destruction they so feared!
Good, Wu Kong! GOOD! Now you, too,\ncan see the power of the dark that has\nbeen burning inside me for so long!
Sha Wujing, give me the Jin Gu Er!
Meee? I don't have it! Why, it must be...\nOh, very well. Here.
Are you planning to seal me inside that\nthing once again? You, a boy who is\nbarely a sealer?!
The hell?! Don't WEAR the thing!
This is the proof of Wu Kong's resolve.\nIt is the way he has chosen for himself—\nthe way of belief in Mei Hou Wang.
With the Jin Gu Er as an intermediary,\nhe will attempt to use the power of his\nown heart to seal Mei Hou Wang.
If he succeeds, Mei Hou Wang will no\nlonger be bound to the Jin Gu Er.
However, this is a dangerous gamble.\nIf it fails, his life will be forfeit.
How can you permit him to do\nsomething so dangerous?!
Because I've come to believe in him,\nand in what he believes in.
What do you think you're doing, boy?!
I told you we were gonna be\ntravel buddies, remember?
And if you come with me, I'll show you\neverything the world has to offer!
A HUMAN LIKE YOU COULD NEVER\nUNDERSTAND ONE SUCH AS ME!
He is still too powerful to be sealed.
Then this is where we come in—we'll\nfight him and weaken him until he\nsees the sense in Wu Kong's plan.
Then let's save him from the darkness!
On my mark, everyone! Come on!
